import { FunctionComponent } from 'react'; import { useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import ElysiaLogo from '../../../shared/images/Elysia_Logo.png'; import ElysiaLogoBeta from '../../../shared/images/Elysia_Logo_Beta.png'; const Navigation: FunctionComponent = () => { const location = useLocation(); return (

SERVICE

); } export default Navigation;
